title: Sunny Side of Life

tokens.lyric: There's a sunny side where no ills betide

lines.raw: [G]There's a sunny side where no ills betide

tokens.lyric: On the road that we must go

lines.raw: [C]On the road that we must go

tokens.lyric: There are pleasant vales verdant hills and dales

lines.raw: [G]There are pleasant vales verdant hills and dales

tokens.lyric: Where sweet flowers ever grow

lines.raw: [D]Where sweet flowers ever grow

tokens.lyric: Bros: Oh the happy sunny pretty rolling dales

lines.raw: [G]Bros: Oh the happy sunny pretty rolling dales

tokens.lyric: Sis': happy sunny pretty rolling dales

lines.raw: [D]Sis': happy sunny pretty rolling dales

tokens.lyric: Bros: Where the sweetest gladness ever there prevails

lines.raw: [G]Bros: Where the sweetest gladness ever there prevails

tokens.lyric: Sis': sweetest joy and gladness ever there prevails

lines.raw: [D7]Sis': sweetest joy and gladness ever there prevails

tokens.lyric: Bros: Where the sunshine lingers on the hills

lines.raw: [G7]Bros: Where the sunshine lingers on the hills

tokens.lyric: Sis': Where the sunshine ever lingers on the grand majestic hills

lines.raw: [C]Sis': Where the sunshine ever lingers on the grand majestic hills

tokens.lyric: Bros: On the sunny side of life

lines.raw: [G]Bros: On the sunny side of life

tokens.lyric: Sis': On the happy sunny side of life

lines.raw: [D]Sis': On the happy sunny side of life

tokens.lyric: There's shady dells where no gladness dwells

lines.raw: [G]There's shady dells where no gladness dwells

tokens.lyric: And the clouds obstruct the view

lines.raw: [C]And the clouds obstruct the view

tokens.lyric: But a brighter way like the light of day

lines.raw: [G]But a brighter way like the light of day

tokens.lyric: Is awaiting now for you

lines.raw: [D]Is awaiting now for you

tokens.lyric: Let us sing a song as we go along

lines.raw: [G]Let us sing a song as we go along

tokens.lyric: Let us banish cares and strife

lines.raw: [C]Let us banish cares and strife

tokens.lyric: That the world might know as we onward go

lines.raw: [G]That the world might know as we onward go

tokens.lyric: There's a sunny side of life

lines.raw: [D]There's a sunny side of life

source:
{title: Sunny Side of Life}
{key: G}

{section: Verse 1}
[G]There's a sunny side where no ills betide
[C]On the road that we must go
[G]There are pleasant vales verdant hills and dales
[D]Where sweet flowers ever grow

{section: Chorus}
[G]Bros: Oh the happy sunny pretty rolling dales
[D]Sis': happy sunny pretty rolling dales
[G]Bros: Where the sweetest gladness ever there prevails
[D7]Sis': sweetest joy and gladness ever there prevails
[G7]Bros: Where the sunshine lingers on the hills
[C]Sis': Where the sunshine ever lingers on the grand majestic hills
[G]Bros: On the sunny side of life
[D]Sis': On the happy sunny side of life

{{section: Verse 2}
[G]There's shady dells where no gladness dwells
[C]And the clouds obstruct the view
[G]But a brighter way like the light of day
[D]Is awaiting now for you

{{section: Verse 3}
[G]Let us sing a song as we go along
[C]Let us banish cares and strife
[G]That the world might know as we onward go
[D]There's a sunny side of life
